H0.text: The mass is the property of the slide that tells Carlos how much energy the slide absorbed from the Sun while he was playing on it on a sunny summer day.

H1.text: The color is the property of the slide that tells Carlos how much energy the slide absorbed from the Sun while he was playing on it on a sunny summer day.

H2.text: The height is the property of the slide that tells Carlos how much energy the slide absorbed from the Sun.

H3.text: The temperature is the property of the slide that tells Carlos how much energy the slide absorbed from the Sun while he was playing on it on a sunny summer day.

A4.text: the color of an object depends on how it absorbs and scatters light

A5.text: the absorbed light is often dissipated as heat
